Articles.Content:
Hello,

I am restating to checkout Telemachus and a few other 'Mission Control' ideas floatin around but I want to collect RAW data from multiple vessels at the same time; mainly just main resources and some orbital data.

I want to port the data into my own software for alarms etc maybe even automation; I am checking into Alarm Clock but it is all code; I am a coder but am looking for an easy way out.

Does .csv, SQL or other data-linking MODS exist out there? I am seeing mostly Pytho scripting and

http://ksp-kos.github.io/KOS_DOC/

but I read a long time ago there was a program that ported out raw data; now that I think of it it would be similar to a program that reads off data from the persistent file maybe and sends it to whatever program MOD I want.

This looks interesting:

.........

Link above missing for a bit ...

Cmdr Zeta

Hi,

Got it thank you. I am also looking for just maybe resource monitoring of all vessels maybe not any auto-control of them; this might make my program useage simpler; Telemachus looks promising; I cant access the DLLs tho yet.

Cmdr Zeta
